title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Nasdaq: Build resilient infrastructure for global financial services (HMC327)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 纳斯达克：为全球金融服务构建弹性基础设施 (HMC327)
abstract: This session discusses how Nasdaq modernizes its mission-critical capital markets infrastructure while upholding the highest level of resiliency. Learn how Nasdaq integrates AWS Outposts and multi-region deployments into its core trading and surrounding systems, balancing cloud flexibility with performance and reliability. Explore common architectural patterns that Nasdaq uses, including specialized compute instances and accelerated networking for ultra-low latency workloads. Discover best practices for managing stateful systems that must maintain uptime and data integrity. See how Nasdaq and AWS are helping transform operations across the financial services industry and gain practical tips for your own modernization initiatives.
abstract_cn: 本次会议探讨纳斯达克如何在保持最高级别弹性的同时实现其关键任务资本市场基础设施的现代化。了解纳斯达克如何将 AWS Outposts 和多区域部署集成到其核心交易及周边系统中，在云灵活性与性能和可靠性之间取得平衡。探索纳斯达克使用的常见架构模式，包括用于超低延迟工作负载的专用计算实例和加速网络。了解管理必须保持正常运行时间和数据完整性的有状态系统的最佳实践。了解纳斯达克和 AWS 如何帮助推动整个金融服务行业的运营转型，并获得适用于您自己现代化计划的实用技巧。
